name: Pink Peony
description: A large, round-petaled flower with a lush, full bloom in soft pink. Peonies symbolize prosperity and are known for their strong, sweet fragrance.

name: Red Rose
description: A classic flower with velvety red petals and a distinctive shape. Roses are the universal symbol of love and passion.

name: Blue Hydrangea
description: A large, round cluster of small flowers in a striking blue color. Hydrangeas are known for their voluminous appearance and color that can change based on soil pH.

name: Yellow Sunflower
description: A large, bold flower with bright yellow petals surrounding a dark center. Sunflowers are known for their cheerful appearance and tendency to turn toward the sun.

name: Purple Dahlia
description: A complex flower with many layered petals in a rich purple hue. Dahlias are known for their intricate petal arrangements and wide variety of colors and forms.

name: White Tulip
description: An elegant, cup-shaped flower with clean white petals. Tulips are known for their simple, refined form and association with spring.

name: Lavender Freesia
description: A delicate, tubular flower with a sweet scent and soft lavender color. Freesias are known for their fragrance and graceful stems with multiple buds.

name: Coral Ranunculus
description: A medium-sized flower with layers of delicate petals in a vibrant coral color. Ranunculus are known for their rose-like appearance and paper-thin petals.

name: Yellow Daffodil
description: A cheerful spring flower with a distinctive trumpet-shaped center surrounded by petals, usually in bright yellow. Daffodils symbolize rebirth and new beginnings.

name: Baby's Breath
description: Tiny white flowers on delicate, branching stems. Baby's breath is commonly used as a filler in floral arrangements, adding a soft, cloud-like texture.

name: Pink Wax Flower
description: Small, star-shaped pink flowers on woody stems. Wax flowers are known for their long-lasting nature and waxy texture, making them excellent accent flowers.

name: White Chamomile
description: Small, daisy-like flowers with white petals and yellow centers. Chamomiles are known for their simple, cheerful appearance and medicinal properties.

name: Blue Forget-me-not
description: Tiny, five-petaled blue flowers with yellow centers. Forget-me-nots are known for their delicate appearance and symbolic meaning of remembrance and true love.
